scripts.bundle: cd ios/ && rm -rf bundle && mkdir bundle/ && cd ../ && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ./ios/bundle/index.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest ./ios/bundle
scripts.staging: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleReleaseStaging && cd ../ && react-native run-android --variant=releaseStaging --appIdSuffix=releaseStaging
scripts.release: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ../ && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.cpfile: cp 项目说明/QRScanner.js node_modules/ac-qrcode/ && cp 项目说明/index.js node_modules/react-native-camera/index.js && cp 项目说明/折线图/index.js node_modules/native-echarts/src/components/Echarts/
scripts.hot-ios: code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-IOS  ios   --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Staging --des "$DESC" --m true
scripts.hot-android: code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-Android android --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Staging --des "$DESC" --m true
scripts.hot: code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-IOS  ios   --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Staging  --des "$DESC" --m true & code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-Android android --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Staging --des "$DESC" --m true
scripts.codepush-ios: code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-IOS  ios   --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Production  --des "$DESC" --m true
scripts.codepush-android: code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-Android android --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Production --des "$DESC" --m true
scripts.codepush: code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-IOS  ios   --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Production  --des "$DESC" --m true & code-push release-react 376368673/Wepay-Android android --t 1.2.9 --dev false --d Production --des "$DESC" --m true
